subject: Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: Regena Jackson, who averaged 8.7 points for the Louisiana-Monroe women’s team last season, was arrested early Saturday for firing a gun from an apartment balcony, a university spokeswoman, Laura Harris, said. Harris said that no one was hurt, and that Jackson was expelled from the college.
